spec_data.Name: texlive-metapost
spec_data.Description:
MetaPost uses a language based on that of Metafont to produce
precise technical illustrations. Its output is scalable
PostScript or SVG, rather than the bitmaps Metafont creates.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:24:57 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A development of Metafont for creating graphics
